feed.title: SkySplat - skysplat
feed.subtitle: A hub for 3D Gaussian Splatting, Blender integration, and cutting-edge 3DGS research. Explore tools, tutorials, and insights for working with 3D Gaussian Splatting in Blender.

entry.title: Welcome to SkySplat: Bringing 3D Gaussian Splatting to Blender
entry.summary: Weâ€™re excited to announce the launch of SkySplat, an open-source initiative dedicated to making 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS) technology accessible to artists, researchers, and developers worldwide.
